showFullCode.title: Show Complete File
showFullCode.description: Show complete file for code, with bootstrap and error handling included.

Nodes.Text: The Releans SDK enables developers to use Releans Services in their code. You can get started in minutes.
The generated code depends on a few Ruby gems. The references to these gems are added in the gemspec file. The easiest way to resolve the dependencies, build the gem and install it is through Rake:

1. Install Rake if not already installed: `gem install rake`
  2. Install Bundler if not already installed: `gem install bundler`
  3. From terminal/cmd navigate to the root directory of the SDK.
  4. Invoke: `rake install`
Alternatively, you can build and install the gem manually:

1. From terminal/cmd navigate to the root directory of the SDK.
  2. Run the build command: `gem build releans.gemspec`
  3. Run the install command: `gem install releans-1.0.0.gem`

The following section explains how to use the releans ruby gem in a new Rails project using RubyMine™. The basic workflow presented here is also applicable if you prefer using a different editor or IDE.
Close any existing projects in RubyMine™ by selecting `File -> Close Project`. Next, click on `Create New Project` to create a new project from scratch.

Nodes.AlterateText: Create a new project in RubyMine - Step 1

Nodes.Text: Next, provide `TestApp` as the project name, choose `Rails Application` as the project type, and click `OK`.

Nodes.AlterateText: Create a new Rails Application in RubyMine - Step 2

Nodes.Text: In the next dialog make sure that the correct Ruby SDK is being used (minimum 2.0.0) and click `OK`.

Nodes.AlterateText: Create a new Rails Application in RubyMine - Step 3

Nodes.Text: In order to use the Tester gem in the new project we must add a gem reference. Locate the `Gemfile` in the Project Explorer window under the `TestApp` project node. The file contains references to all gems being used in the project. Here, add the reference to the library gem by adding the following line: `gem 'releans', '~> 1.0.0'`

Nodes.AlterateText: Add new reference to the Gemfile

Nodes.Text: Once the `TestApp` project is created, a folder named `controllers` will be visible in the *Project Explorer* under the following path: `TestApp > app > controllers`. Right click on this folder and select `New -> Run Rails Generator...`.

Nodes.AlterateText: Run Rails Generator on Controllers Folder

Nodes.Text: Selecting the said option will popup a small window where the generator names are displayed. Here, select the `controller` template.
Next, a popup window will ask you for a Controller name and included Actions. For controller name provide `Hello` and include an action named `Index` and click `OK`.

A new controller class named `HelloController` will be created in a file named `hello_controller.rb` containing a method named `Index`. In this method, add code for initialization and a sample for its usage.
To initialize and authenticate the API client, the following parameters need to be passed.
The API client can be initialized as following.
The singleton instance of the `BalanceController` class can be accessed from the API Client.

Nodes.Title: Note
Nodes.Body: This endpoint does not require authentication.

Nodes.HttpCallTemplate: {"method":"GET","url":"https://platform.releans.com/api/balance{% capture inline_query_capture_876234 %}{% endcapture %}{% if inline_query_capture_876234.size > 0 %}?{% endif %}{{ inline_query_capture_876234 | remove_first:'&' }}","headers":{% capture header_capture_9023987234 %},"Authorization":"Bearer {{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | json: false }}"{% endcapture %}{{ '{' }}{{ header_capture_9023987234 | remove_first:',' }}},"body":{{ '{' }}"type":"none"}}

Templates.RUBY_GENERIC_LIB:
{% if showFullCode %}require 'releans'

include Releans

o_auth_access_token = {% if config["OAuthAccessToken"] != nil %}'{{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | replace: "\\", "\\" | replace: "'", "\'" }}'{% else %}nil{% endif %}

client = Releans.new(o_auth_access_token: o_auth_access_token)

balance_controller = client.balance
{% endif %}{% if showFullCode %}begin
  {% endif %}result = balance_controller.get_balance(){% if showFullCode %}
rescue APIException => ex
  puts "Caught APIException: #{ex.message}"
end
{% endif %}

Nodes.Text: The singleton instance of the `MessageController` class can be accessed from the API Client.

Nodes.Title: Note
Nodes.Body: This endpoint does not require authentication.

Data: Sender id to send the message from.
The mobile number supposed to receive the message.

senderId.description: Sender id to send the message from.

mobileNumber.description: The mobile number supposed to receive the message.

Nodes.HttpCallTemplate: {"method":"POST","url":"https://platform.releans.com/api/message/send{% capture inline_query_capture_876234 %}{% endcapture %}{% if inline_query_capture_876234.size > 0 %}?{% endif %}{{ inline_query_capture_876234 | remove_first:'&' }}","headers":{% capture header_capture_9023987234 %},"Authorization":"Bearer {{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | json: false }}"{% endcapture %}{{ '{' }}{{ header_capture_9023987234 | remove_first:',' }}},"body":{{ '{' }}"type":"form","data":[{% capture form_capture_238764 %},["senderId", {% if call["args"]["senderId"] != nil %}{{ call["args"]["senderId"] | json: false }}{% else %}null{% endif %}],["mobileNumber", {% if call["args"]["mobileNumber"] != nil %}{{ call["args"]["mobileNumber"] | json: false }}{% else %}null{% endif %}],["message", {% if call["args"]["message"] != nil %}{{ call["args"]["message"] | json: false }}{% else %}null{% endif %}]{% endcapture %}{{ form_capture_238764 | remove_first:',' }}]}}

Nodes.Text: List all messages sent by the account.

Nodes.Title: Note
Nodes.Body: This endpoint does not require authentication.

Nodes.HttpCallTemplate: {"method":"GET","url":"https://platform.releans.com/api/message{% capture inline_query_capture_876234 %}{% endcapture %}{% if inline_query_capture_876234.size > 0 %}?{% endif %}{{ inline_query_capture_876234 | remove_first:'&' }}","headers":{% capture header_capture_9023987234 %},"Authorization":"Bearer {{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | json: false }}","Accept":"application/json"{% endcapture %}{{ '{' }}{{ header_capture_9023987234 | remove_first:',' }}},"body":{{ '{' }}"type":"none"}}

Templates.RUBY_GENERIC_LIB:
{% if showFullCode %}require 'releans'

include Releans

o_auth_access_token = {% if config["OAuthAccessToken"] != nil %}'{{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | replace: "\\", "\\" | replace: "'", "\'" }}'{% else %}nil{% endif %}

client = Releans.new(o_auth_access_token: o_auth_access_token)

message_controller = client.message
{% endif %}{% if showFullCode %}begin
  {% endif %}result = message_controller.get_all_messages(){% if showFullCode %}
rescue APIException => ex
  puts "Caught APIException: #{ex.message}"
end
{% endif %}

Nodes.Text: Return cost of sending a message to the number.

Nodes.Title: Note
Nodes.Body: This endpoint does not require authentication.

Data: Mobile number you want to know the price of sending a message.

mobileNumber.description: Mobile number you want to know the price of sending a message.

Nodes.HttpCallTemplate: {"method":"GET","url":"https://platform.releans.com/api/message/price{% capture inline_query_capture_876234 %}&mobileNumber={% if call["args"]["mobileNumber"] != nil %}{% capture json_strip_quote_237984 %}{{ call["args"]["mobileNumber"] | url_encode | json: false }}{% endcapture %}{% assign json_strip_size_9870234 = json_strip_quote_237984 | size | minus: 2 %}{{ json_strip_quote_237984 | slice: 1, json_strip_size_9870234 }}{% else %}null{% endif %}{% endcapture %}{% if inline_query_capture_876234.size > 0 %}?{% endif %}{{ inline_query_capture_876234 | remove_first:'&' }}","headers":{% capture header_capture_9023987234 %},"Authorization":"Bearer {{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | json: false }}"{% endcapture %}{{ '{' }}{{ header_capture_9023987234 | remove_first:',' }}},"body":{{ '{' }}"type":"none"}}

Nodes.Text: Return the details of the message.

Nodes.Title: Note
Nodes.Body: This endpoint does not require authentication.

Data: Id of the message you need to return its details.

id.description: Id of the message you need to return its details.

Nodes.HttpCallTemplate: {"method":"GET","url":"https://platform.releans.com/api/message/view{% capture inline_query_capture_876234 %}&id={% if call["args"]["id"] != nil %}{% capture json_strip_quote_237984 %}{{ call["args"]["id"] | url_encode | json: false }}{% endcapture %}{% assign json_strip_size_9870234 = json_strip_quote_237984 | size | minus: 2 %}{{ json_strip_quote_237984 | slice: 1, json_strip_size_9870234 }}{% else %}null{% endif %}{% endcapture %}{% if inline_query_capture_876234.size > 0 %}?{% endif %}{{ inline_query_capture_876234 | remove_first:'&' }}","headers":{% capture header_capture_9023987234 %},"Authorization":"Bearer {{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | json: false }}","Accept":"application/json"{% endcapture %}{{ '{' }}{{ header_capture_9023987234 | remove_first:',' }}},"body":{{ '{' }}"type":"none"}}

Nodes.Text: The singleton instance of the `SenderController` class can be accessed from the API Client.
Create a new sender id to send messages using it

Nodes.Title: Note
Nodes.Body: This endpoint does not require authentication.

Data: Name you want to register as Sender Name

senderName.description: Name you want to register as Sender Name

Nodes.HttpCallTemplate: {"method":"POST","url":"https://platform.releans.com/api/sender/create{% capture inline_query_capture_876234 %}{% endcapture %}{% if inline_query_capture_876234.size > 0 %}?{% endif %}{{ inline_query_capture_876234 | remove_first:'&' }}","headers":{% capture header_capture_9023987234 %},"Authorization":"Bearer {{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | json: false }}"{% endcapture %}{{ '{' }}{{ header_capture_9023987234 | remove_first:',' }}},"body":{{ '{' }}"type":"text","data":{{ call["args"]["senderName"] | json: false }}}}

Nodes.Text: List all senders names associated with the account

Nodes.Title: Note
Nodes.Body: This endpoint does not require authentication.

Nodes.HttpCallTemplate: {"method":"GET","url":"https://platform.releans.com/api/sender{% capture inline_query_capture_876234 %}{% endcapture %}{% if inline_query_capture_876234.size > 0 %}?{% endif %}{{ inline_query_capture_876234 | remove_first:'&' }}","headers":{% capture header_capture_9023987234 %},"Authorization":"Bearer {{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | json: false }}","Accept":"application/json"{% endcapture %}{{ '{' }}{{ header_capture_9023987234 | remove_first:',' }}},"body":{{ '{' }}"type":"none"}}

{% if showFullCode %}require 'releans'

include Releans

o_auth_access_token = {% if config["OAuthAccessToken"] != nil %}'{{ config["OAuthAccessToken"] | replace: "\\", "\\" | replace: "'", "\'" }}'{% else %}nil{% endif %}

client = Releans.new(o_auth_access_token: o_auth_access_token)

sender_controller = client.sender
{% endif %}{% if showFullCode %}begin
  {% endif %}result = sender_controller.get_all_senders(){% if showFullCode %}
rescue APIException => ex
  puts "Caught APIException: #{ex.message}"
end
{% endif %}

Nodes.Text: Return the details of the sender name.

Nodes.Title: Note
Nodes.Body: This endpoint does not require authentication.

Data: The sender id you want its details

id.description: The sender id you want its details
